√bhās 'shine'

present: [1.] bhā́sati etc. AV.+  bhā́sate etc. E.+  

perfect: babhāse etc. E.+  

[aorist: ababhāsat  abībhasat  abhāsiṣṭa  bhāsiṣyate  bhāsitā  ]

verbal: bhāsita  

secondary: intensive: bābhās-   -- desiderative: bibhāsiṣa-   -- causative: bhāsayati etc. U.+  bhāsayate  bhāsyate  

derivatives: bhās E.+  bhāsá B.+  bhāsaka C.  bhāsin E.+  bhāsya C.  -bhāsana E.+  bhā́sas RV.  bhāsura E.  bhāsvará B.+  

Doubtless a secondary root-form from √bhā, perhaps through the noun bhā́s. Compare also √bhāṣ.
